entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
